description: outdoor scene in thick black lines of two tables with people seated around them in the middle-ground; in the lower left corner of the foreground is a section of a table with a teapot and cup and saucer; in the foreground on the right side is a tree with a thick black trunk
inscription: LLC of sheet, in pencil: E 12 | LRC of sheet, in red pencil: 1 | ULC of sheet in pencil, on verso: 2331
signed: LR in pencil, below image: Walter Gramatté / 1916 | LL in pencil, below image: Café-Garten.
title: Cafe-Garden
